-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | generate thumbnail image
--   
@package thumbnail
@version 0.8.0

module Graphics.Thumbnail
data ImageFormat
Gif :: ImageFormat
Jpeg :: ImageFormat
Png :: ImageFormat
data Thumbnail
Thumbnail :: ImageFormat -> Image -> Size -> ByteString -> Image -> Size -> (FilePath -> IO ()) -> Thumbnail

-- | Image Format Type
fmt :: Thumbnail -> ImageFormat

-- | Thumbnail Image
img :: Thumbnail -> Image

-- | Thumbnail Size
sz :: Thumbnail -> Size

-- | Thumbnail Data
lbs :: Thumbnail -> ByteString

-- | Original Image
orgImg :: Thumbnail -> Image

-- | Original Size
orgSZ :: Thumbnail -> Size
saveFile :: Thumbnail -> FilePath -> IO ()

-- | Create a thumbnails with the default size
mkThumbnail :: ByteString -> IO (Either String Thumbnail)

-- | Create a thumbnail from a specific subregion of the image
mkThumbnail' :: ((Int, Int), (Int, Int)) -> ByteString -> IO (Either String Thumbnail)
defaultBounds :: ((Int, Int), (Int, Int))
